mapper.update: UPDATE Carpool SET at_work = 1 WHERE carpool_id = #{carpoolID}
UPDATE Carpool SET at_work = 0 WHERE carpool_id = #{carpoolID}
mapper.select: SELECT c.carpool_id, c.date_created, c.at_work FROM Carpool AS c INNER JOIN CarpoolMember AS cm ON c.carpool_id=cm.carpool_id GROUP BY cm.carpool_id HAVING COUNT(cm.employee_id) < 4

SELECT c.carpool_id, c.date_created, c.at_work FROM Carpool AS c INNER JOIN CarpoolMember AS cm ON c.carpool_id=cm.carpool_id WHERE c.at_work = 1 GROUP BY cm.carpool_id HAVING COUNT(cm.employee_id) < 4
